author: jorge.ici
title: Cardano & Mental Health
description: Depression is a public health problem. Lost productivity, because of anxiety and depression, costs the global economy US$ 1 trillion yearly.
solution: Cardano can be a catalyst for novel psychotherapies, as Family Constellations (FC). Our articles show the effectiveness of FC on depression.
experience: We work with FC since 2001, developed four technical-scientific protocols for FC, and cooperated in the resolution of a court case using FC.
